overview:
Pam graduated from Newbury College in Boston, MA with a degree in Finance and a minor in Marketing. Pamela has been involved in the Internet market since 1998. She developed managed and sold 6 sites including a profitable sales portal Salesvault.com. Salesvault was based on an advertising model and was a leader of its time in concept and functionality. Pamela successfully sold advertising on salesvault (display, sponsorships, branding, etc) to create a positive revenue flow and a profitable company.

In addition to salesvault she helped develop a chain of employment related sites which included resume distribution services as well a several niche job boards. Her key strengths include Customer Relations, Public Relations and Promotion as well as Business Development, Project Management.
